divs: Sighting DetailsObject at first appeared like a star almost staionary? It then moved west and then made an arc and moved north. It appeared starlike at first but then got very bright as it was directly overhead - like Venus at its brightest. It then faded out of sight. While it was overhead, it seemed pretty close - like a low flying prop-plane. But there was absolutley no noise and no flashing lights that you would expect from an airplane. No idea what it was.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Springdale
There were no other sightings in Springdale on or around August 13th 2011
Summary: Bright silent starlike object that arced across the sky from west to north.
